Posts.Content: anita11 wrote: Hello everyone, I have been diagnosed with inflammatory breast cancer and am so scared. Has spread to lymph nodes but contrast cat scan did not show any masses anywhere else, lungs etc look clear. My GP says the prognosis for this type of cancer is not good and that it is aggressive. Don't know too much more but I have my first appointment with my oncologist tomorrow morning so should have a clearer picture of what I am dealing with soon. Does anyone here have any experience with inflammatory breast cancer? Everything I read about it is frightening me so much. Thanks for any help.    Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Inflammatory breast cancer anita11 anita11
